page.title: 06The policeman in Lydden
page.content: Lydden is policed by a rural policeman who is also responsible for Denton and Wootton.He works from his home at Temple Ewell but he is responsible to the Dover Police H.Q.The days of the village policeman who was resident and responsible for a single village have passed,due partly to cost and partly to an improvement in communications which enables a single policeman to cover a wider area.The rural policeman works shifts and any emergencies during his off-duty time will be covered by a neighbouring rural policeman.He patrols the village by car,motorbike and on foot and in addition to maintaining law and order he is involved with all village activities,particularly at the local school.He attends sports days and assists with projects,first aid and cycling proficiency.
